name: places/ChIJ6Se3pXn2wokRCv2HXXXAulY
adrFormatAddress: 2453 7th Ave, New York, NY 10030, USA

originalText.text: I was a long-time customer of Jackson Hewitt on West 143rd Street, and once I moved away several years ago, I utilized another Jackson Hewitt establishment closer to my home. I recently returned and met with Rhonda, who is such a kind, patient, considerate, and ethical person, who is extremely knowledgeable, and will give you correct information in regards to your tax return. I am going to go back to the West 143rd Street office this year, and will permanently continue to use their services on a yearly basis, thanks to Rhonda!  Highly recommended!

originalText.text: While visiting Jackson Hewitt, my tax preparer made me feel comfortable, and confident that she knew her stuff. By the end of my visit she had cleaned up what other prepares had made out be be a deficiency in more than one section of information. Although I had all these  discrepancies on file, she took her time and inputted the proper information along with the right amount of numerical value, and the appropriate line, that it is to be filed and documented. Thanks Jackson Hewitt!!!

originalText.text: Jermaine and the other staff members are awesome I have been doing own taxes for few years through Turbo Tax but this year had a few things I was uncertain of so decide try Jackson Hewitt very satisfied will continue to use them as my tax preparers.

originalText.text: My tax preparer Ms. Ronda Kaba is by far the best tax preparer. She is very tentative to your needs & concerns. She will explain all the calculations that’s being done, answer any questions you may have and leave you feeling amazingly secure about choosing Jackson Hewitt. She is most definitely a most valuable asset to the establishment. Thank you Ms. Kaba.

originalText.text:
This Jackson Hewitt office at 2453 Adam Clayton Avenue is staffed with some of the most efficient tax professionals in New York City. Manager Collins Ogbolu, senior staffer, Ronda Mitchell Kaba and the rest of the team always demonstrate a sense of commitment, hospitality, urgency, and respect toward  customers and clients. They also provide useful advice whenever it's needed.
They are like a responsible family to us, customers. I have been doing
my taxes here for more than a decade now and I cannot afford to go
anywhere else. They are simply the best. Keep the good work. guys. Cheers!
Aroun R. Deen
New Yorker
